="preserve">Reverse-Flash is a name used by many fictional supervillains appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics.
A known version of the character is Edward Clariss (also known as the Rival and Rival Flash) first appeared in "Flash Comics" #104 (February 1949), and was created by John Broome and Joe Kubert.
The character's design is the complete opposite of The Flash with a yellow suit and red flash design.
